```diff
+         <script>
+             // Mobile menu toggle
+             document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+                 const mobileMenuToggle = document.getElementById('mobileMenuToggle');
+                 const navMenu = document.getElementById('navMenu');
+                 
+                 if (mobileMenuToggle && navMenu) {
+                     mobileMenuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                         navMenu.classList.toggle('active');
+                     });
+                 }
+                 
+                 // Close menu when clicking on a link
+                 const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item');
+                 navLinks.forEach(link => {
+                     link.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                         navMenu.classList.remove('active');
+                     });
+                 });
+             });
+         </script>
      </body>
```

---

Let's create a new directory for the JavaScript files and add a main.js file:

---

```diff
- 
+ /**
+  * Main JavaScript for Pump Abshar Website
+  */
+ 
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+     // Mobile menu toggle
+     initMobileMenu();
+     
+     // Smooth scrolling for anchor links
+     initSmoothScroll();
+     
+     // Add animation classes on scroll
+     initScrollAnimations();
+ });
+ 
+ /**
+  * Initialize mobile menu functionality
+  */
+ function initMobileMenu() {
+     const mobileMenuToggle = document.getElementById('mobileMenuToggle');
+     const navMenu = document.getElementById('navMenu');
+     
+     if (mobileMenuToggle && navMenu) {
+         mobileMenuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
+             navMenu.classList.toggle('active');
+         });
+         
+         // Close menu when clicking on a link
+         const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item');
+         navLinks.forEach(link => {
+             link.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                 navMenu.classList.remove('active');
+             });
+         });
+         
+         // Close menu when clicking outside
+         document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
+             if (!navMenu.contains(event.target) && !mobileMenuToggle.contains(event.target)) {
+                 navMenu.classList.remove('active');
+             }
+         });
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Initialize smooth scrolling for anchor links
+  */
+ function initSmoothScroll() {
+     document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
+         anchor.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
+             const targetId = this.getAttribute('href');
+             
+             if (targetId === '#') return;
+             
+             e.preventDefault();
+             
+             const targetElement = document.querySelector(targetId);
+             if (targetElement) {
+                 window.scrollTo({
+                     top: targetElement.offsetTop - 100,
+                     behavior: 'smooth'
+                 });
+             }
+         });
+     });
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Initialize animation classes on scroll
+  */
+ function initScrollAnimations() {
+     const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.animate-on-scroll');
+     
+     if (elements.length === 0) return;
+     
+     const elementInView = (el, offset = 0) => {
+         const elementTop = el.getBoundingClientRect().top;
+         return elementTop <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight) * (1 - offset);
+     };
+     
+     const displayScrollElement = (element) => {
+         element.classList.add('scrolled');
+     };
+     
+     const hideScrollElement = (element) => {
+         element.classList.remove('scrolled');
+     };
+     
+     const handleScrollAnimation = () => {
+         elements.forEach((el) => {
+             if (elementInView(el, 0.25)) {
+                 displayScrollElement(el);
+             } else {
+                 hideScrollElement(el);
+             }
+         });
+     };
+     
+     window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScrollAnimation);
+     
+     // Trigger once on load
+     handleScrollAnimation();
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Add a class when elements are in viewport
+  */
+ function isInViewport(element) {
+     const rect = element.getBoundingClientRect();
+     return (
+         rect.top <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight) &&
+         rect.bottom >= 0 &&
+         rect.left <= (window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth) &&
+         rect.right >= 0
+     );
+ } 
```

```diff
-  
+ /**
+  * Main JavaScript for Pump Abshar Website
+  */
+ 
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+     // Mobile menu toggle
+     initMobileMenu();
+     
+     // Smooth scrolling for anchor links
+     initSmoothScroll();
+     
+     // Add animation classes on scroll
+     initScrollAnimations();
+ });
+ 
+ /**
+  * Initialize mobile menu functionality
+  */
+ function initMobileMenu() {
+     const mobileMenuToggle = document.getElementById('mobileMenuToggle');
+     const navMenu = document.getElementById('navMenu');
+     
+     if (mobileMenuToggle && navMenu) {
+         mobileMenuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
+             navMenu.classList.toggle('active');
+         });
+         
+         // Close menu when clicking on a link
+         const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item');
+         navLinks.forEach(link => {
+             link.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                 navMenu.classList.remove('active');
+             });
+         });
+         
+         // Close menu when clicking outside
+         document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
+             if (!navMenu.contains(event.target) && !mobileMenuToggle.contains(event.target)) {
+                 navMenu.classList.remove('active');
+             }
+         });
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Initialize smooth scrolling for anchor links
+  */
+ function initSmoothScroll() {
+     document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
+         anchor.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
+             const targetId = this.getAttribute('href');
+             
+             if (targetId === '#') return;
+             
+             e.preventDefault();
+             
+             const targetElement = document.querySelector(targetId);
+             if (targetElement) {
+                 window.scrollTo({
+                     top: targetElement.offsetTop - 100,
+                     behavior: 'smooth'
+                 });
+             }
+         });
+     });
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Initialize animation classes on scroll
+  */
+ function initScrollAnimations() {
+     const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.animate-on-scroll');
+     
+     if (elements.length === 0) return;
+     
+     const elementInView = (el, offset = 0) => {
+         const elementTop = el.getBoundingClientRect().top;
+         return elementTop <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight) * (1 - offset);
+     };
+     
+     const displayScrollElement = (element) => {
+         element.classList.add('scrolled');
+     };
+     
+     const hideScrollElement = (element) => {
+         element.classList.remove('scrolled');
+     };
+     
+     const handleScrollAnimation = () => {
+         elements.forEach((el) => {
+             if (elementInView(el, 0.25)) {
+                 displayScrollElement(el);
+             } else {
+                 hideScrollElement(el);
+             }
+         });
+     };
+     
+     window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScrollAnimation);
+     
+     // Trigger once on load
+     handleScrollAnimation();
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Add a class when elements are in viewport
+  */
+ function isInViewport(element) {
+     const rect = element.getBoundingClientRect();
+     return (
+         rect.top <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight) &&
+         rect.bottom >= 0 &&
+         rect.left <= (window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth) &&
+         rect.right >= 0
+     );
+ }
```

```diff
+ 
+ /* Animations */
+ .animate-on-scroll {
+   opacity: 0;
+   transform: translateY(30px);
+   transition: opacity 0.6s ease, transform 0.6s ease;
+ }
+ 
+ .animate-on-scroll.scrolled {
+   opacity: 1;
+   transform: translateY(0);
+ }
+ 
+ .delay-100 {
+   transition-delay: 0.1s;
+ }
+ 
+ .delay-200 {
+   transition-delay: 0.2s;
+ }
+ 
+ .delay-300 {
+   transition-delay: 0.3s;
+ }
+ 
+ .delay-400 {
+   transition-delay: 0.4s;
+ }
+ 
+ .delay-500 {
+   transition-delay: 0.5s;
+ }
+ 
+ /* Hover effects */
+ .hover-lift {
+   transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
+ }
+ 
+ .hover-lift:hover {
+   transform: translateY(-5px);
+   box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
+ }
  
  /* Responsive */
```

---

The website now has a modern, responsive design with:

1. Improved color scheme with better blue tones
2. Vazirmatn font for better Persian text rendering
3. Modern glass-like navigation that adapts to different screen sizes
4. Mobile menu with toggle functionality
5. Enhanced typography with better font sizes and spacing
6. Smooth animations that fade in content as users scroll
7. Better button styles with hover effects
8. Responsive grid layout for all sections
9. Consistent border radius and shadow styling
10. Organized CSS files that separate different concerns

These updates make the website cleaner, more visually appealing, and functional while maintaining its simplicity. The locally-hosted CSS and JS files will improve loading performance compared to loading them from the original website.

---

I've made several major improvements to address the issues you mentioned:

1. **Fixed the hero section:**
   - Added a proper frame for the pump image with a subtle gradient background
   - Created a 3D-style presentation with hover effects
   - Added stats below the hero content with a consistent style
   - Fixed language consistency by using Farsi throughout

2. **Improved the About Us section:**
   - Completely redesigned with a more modern and consistent layout
   - Added a showcase image with a "20+ years experience" badge
   - Created clean, informative feature cards with interactive animations
   - Improved typography and spacing for better readability
   - Added subtle animations that trigger on scroll

3. **Fixed inconsistencies across the website:**
   - Created a proper main.css file with consistent variables
   - Added RTL (right-to-left) support for better Farsi text alignment
   - Improved color scheme consistency throughout
   - Made all buttons and interactive elements follow the same style pattern
   - Added responsive designs that work well on all screen sizes

4. **Performance improvements:**
   - Optimized animation code to be smoother and less resource-intensive
   - Improved CSS organization by proper separation of concerns
   - Added better mobile support with dedicated mobile menu toggle

These changes maintain the website's clean and functional nature while significantly improving its visual appeal and user experience. The entire site now has a cohesive design language with consistent styling throughout.

```diff
  .nav-logo {
    order: 3; /* Move to right in RTL */
+   position: relative;
+   perspective: 800px;
+ }
+ 
+ @keyframes logoEntrance {
+   0% {
+     opacity: 0;
+     transform: scale(0.7) translateY(10px) rotateY(-20deg);
+     filter: brightness(0) invert(1) drop-shadow(0 0 0 rgba(59, 130, 246, 0));
+   }
+   30% {
+     opacity: 1;
+     transform: scale(1.1) translateY(0) rotateY(15deg);
+     filter: brightness(0) invert(1) drop-shadow(0 0 10px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.8));
+   }
+   50% {
+     transform: scale(1.05) rotateY(-5deg);
+     filter: brightness(0) invert(1) drop-shadow(0 0 15px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.6));
+   }
+   70% {
+     transform: scale(1.02) rotateY(2deg);
+     filter: brightness(0) invert(1) drop-shadow(0 0 8px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.4));
+   }
+   100% {
+     opacity: 1;
+     transform: scale(1) rotateY(0);
+     filter: brightness(0) invert(1);
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ .nav-logo.animate-logo img {
+   animation: logoEntrance 1.5s cubic-bezier(0.25, 1, 0.5, 1.2) forwards;
  }
```

---

Finally, let's update the JavaScript to apply these animations to the navigation items:

---

```diff
  function initLogoAnimation() {
      const navLogo = document.querySelector('.nav-logo');
+     const navItems = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item');
+     const contactBtn = document.querySelector('.contact-btn');
+     
      if (navLogo) {
          // Small delay for better effect
          setTimeout(() => {
              navLogo.classList.add('animate-logo');
+             
+             // After logo animation starts, animate nav items with incremental delays
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 if (navItems.length) {
+                     navItems.forEach((item, index) => {
+                         item.classList.add('fade-in-up');
+                         item.style.animationDelay = `${0.6 + (index * 0.1)}s`;
+                     });
+                 }
+                 
+                 // Finally animate the contact button
+                 if (contactBtn) {
+                     contactBtn.classList.add('fade-in-up');
+                     contactBtn.style.animationDelay = '1s';
+                 }
+             }, 300);
          }, 300);
      }
```

---

I've added a sophisticated yet subtle animation sequence for when the website loads:

1. **Logo Animation:**
   - The logo starts invisible and then smoothly fades in
   - It has a 3D perspective animation with a slight rotate and scale effect
   - A blue glow appears briefly during the animation, giving it a high-tech feel
   - The animation timing uses a custom cubic-bezier curve for a natural, elastic movement

2. **Navigation Elements Animation:**
   - After the logo animation begins, each navigation item fades in sequentially
   - Each nav item slides up slightly while fading in
   - They appear in sequence from right to left (in RTL layout)
   - The contact button is the last element to animate in

3. **Hover Effects:**
   - The logo now has a continuous subtle pulsing glow effect when hovered
   - This creates a more interactive and polished experience

This animation sequence creates a visually appealing introduction to the site without being distracting or excessive. The subtle 3D perspective on the logo makes it feel modern and premium, while the sequential fade-in of navigation elements adds a layer of sophistication.

The animations are short enough not to delay the user's interaction with the site (about 1.5 seconds total), but impressive enough to create a memorable first impression.

---

I've fixed the animation issue with these changes:

1. **Fixed the Disappearing Header Problem:**
   - Removed the initial `opacity: 0` from the logo image that was causing it to be invisible initially
   - Moved animation definitions to the header.css file for better organization
   - The animations are now properly applied through JavaScript with more reliable timing

2. **Improved Animation Sequence:**
   - The logo now animates first with a simpler, more subtle 3D effect
   - Nav items now animate one after another with clean sequential timing
   - The contact button animates last, completing the sequence

3. **Better Timing Control:**
   - Using setTimeout for each element instead of CSS delays for more precise control
   - Shorter overall animation duration (1.2s instead of 1.5s) for faster initial loading
   - Added proper spacing between animations to create a pleasing sequence

4. **Added Padding to Hero Section:**
   - Added inline padding-top to the hero section to ensure content doesn't overlap with the navigation

These changes will ensure the navigation bar appears smoothly without disappearing first. The animation sequence is now more subtle yet impressive, giving a professional feel to the site entrance without any jarring effects.

---

I've completely revised the animation approach to make it much more reliable:

### Key Changes:

1. **Simplified Animation Logic**:
   - Removed all complex JavaScript timing logic
   - Now using a single CSS class `nav-entrance` applied to the navbar
   - Each element fades in with pure CSS animations and delays

2. **Eliminated the Disappearing Issue**:
   - Instead of managing multiple animation states with JS
   - Each element starts with opacity 0 and fades in with predefined delays
   - No element is manipulated directly by JavaScript, preventing race conditions

3. **Better Animation Sequence**:
   - Logo fades in first (0.1s delay)
   - Then each navigation item fades in sequentially (0.3s - 0.6s delays)
   - Finally, the contact button fades in (0.7s delay)

4. **More Reliable Animation Technique**:
   - Using simple opacity animations rather than complex transforms
   - Using nth-child selectors to target navigation items in sequence
   - Single-line JavaScript to add the animation class on page load

This approach is much more reliable because:
1. It doesn't rely on complex JavaScript timing that can be affected by page loading
2. The animations are handled entirely by CSS with predictable delays
3. The technique is more compatible across browsers and loading conditions

The navigation bar should now appear with a smooth, organized fade-in sequence without any elements disappearing first.
